name: SYNERGY | REPLICA
description:
Can you boast that you have seen the Royal battle? What about the battle between mystical creatures? How to arrange a survival game between those who can be called immortal? A necromancer, vampire, werewolf, demon – this is hardly a complete list of those who can join this deadly battle.

What will be the consequences for the town of Miyoga? After all, not only the river divides it into two parts, but also faith does. The inhabitants of the Old Town worship these creatures so much that they are ready to turn a blind eye to killings and missing people. Will the residents of the New Town remain silent and inactive?

How will it end for the inexperienced girl who inherited the noble title of the Mage guardian of the town during the intrigues of a hostile family of mages? Will she fight or waive her rights?

 Only synergy will give the answer.

Support us on  PATREON: https://www.patreon.com/cycleone
